post.text: The rigged system may have helped Hillary Clinton escape criminal charges, but the FBI Director did indict her today for her incredible lack of judgment and honesty. Watch her LIE over and over again. Unbelievable! #CrookedHillary #RiggedSystem

comment.author: Nicole
comment.text: Hillary Clinton, with Bill Clinton on her right and Barack Obama on her left, the best two presidents of our time, Donald Trump, the worst candidate in the history of the GOP flanked by Ted Nugent and Sarah Palin...you can't even compare.
